Package oshi.demo.gui

Class ProcessPanel

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
javax.swing.JComponent
javax.swing.JPanel
oshi.demo.gui.OshiJPanel
oshi.demo.gui.ProcessPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ProcessPanel
extends OshiJPanel
Displays a process list, such as ps or task manager. This performs more like Windows Task Manger with current CPU as measured between polling intervals, while PS uses a cumulative CPU value.
See Also:
Serialized Form
